name: Shape Escape (itch) (Dinosire)
description:
Join the shape blocks with their buckets! Our submission to GMTK Jam 2021.

Help the shape blocks traverse the treacherous daycare while avoiding vicious babies and flaming projectiles they knock in their path!

Explore the room in search of your matching block bucket to complete the level!

--------------------

Created By

--------------------

Programmed by me (dinosire).

Art by the lovely Karina.

Music, SFX, and fonts are credited below.

--------------------

Controls

WASD / Arrows
MoveSpace
Jump
PPause

--------------------

--------------------
